data.title: Mind Game Thrillers, Psychological Thriller, and Horror Movies
data.meta_description:
This list consists of films that are in the Thriller and Horror genre, including Mind Game Thrillers and Modern Psychological Horror. Some of the films include modern indie horror flicks like "Saw," "Cube," "The Exam," "You're Next," "Nerve" "The Collector/ The Collection," "Identity," "Vile," "Would you Rather," "The Game," "The Strangers," just to name a few. There are both Modern Psychological Thrillers and Classic Horror films on this list. The majority of these films on this list involve a twisted plot, game, mystery or puzzle for both the audience and characters within the films to solve in order to survive. Some of the films feature a group of strangers, friends, or an individual who is stuck in the middle of a twisted plot. Opposite the audience and protagonist(s) in these films is the antagonist(s) and usually an overarching darker, more sinister universal horror representative of society. 

While there are many psychological/mind game horror movies on this list, it also includes many "classic" horror and Halloween films. Many of the films on this list toy with your mind in some way and feature twisted mind games, suspense, and psychological horror. The List also includes some made-for-tv thrillers and horror/thriller television series and limited series.

Please keep in mind that these films are in no particular order. Over time I have tried to rate the films as well as provide reviews, but it is a work in progress.

"Mind Game Thrillers" Genre term copy written by E. Bruno, 2017

**Apologies for any duplicates. Also, Any suggestions for movies to add to the list, please write in comments. I know there are still dozens of films to add. I try to update as much as possible. 

Check out my other lists including Halloween Horror, Drama, Best Biopics, Best Modern Television Series/Limited Series, and other genres.

List by Erin Elizabeth Morrison- Bruno Check out the links to some of my own creative work, including music/photography/writing... https://soundcloud.com/projectautumn/ http://mystic154.wixsite.com/theartofvanity https://www.linkedin.com/in/erinebruno/

My Bio

Over the past 20 years I have become an avid film viewer and reviewer, and started writing film and music reviews during college and early in my career. Over the past decade I started rating and reviewing films on IMDB as well as creating lists of recommended films of specific genres. This attached list has surpassed my others, gaining almost a half a million views! Thank you!

ANYONE LOOKING FOR A WEB FREELANCE ENTERTAINMENT WRITERS (film and music reviewers), PLEASE CONTACT ME in the comments. You never know who might be looking at this list. I have worked as a freelance writer and editor for almost two decades and I'm always open to new writing experiences. 

Thanks,  

#MovieGurl23 #IMDB #horrorfilm #mindgamethriller #filmreviews #thrillers #500kviews

My Bio

Over the past 20 years I have become an avid film viewer and reviewer, and started writing film and music reviews during college and early in my career. Over the past decade I started rating and reviewing films on IMDB as well as creating lists of recommended films of specific genres. This attached list has surpassed my others, gaining almost a half a million views! Thank you!

ANYONE LOOKING FOR A WEB FREELANCE ENTERTAINMENT WRITERS (film and music reviewers), PLEASE CONTACT ME in the comments. You never know who might be looking at this list. I have worked as a freelance writer and editor for almost two decades and I'm always open to new writing experiences.
